show_hover_image.description: Show or hide content fields without the need to delete the content itself.

slider_width.label: Item Width Mode
slider_width.description: Define whether the width of the slider items is fixed or automatically expanded by its content widths.

slider_min_height.label: Min Height
slider_min_height.description: Use an optional minimum height to prevent the slider from becoming smaller than its content on small devices.

slider_gap.label: Column Gap
slider_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid columns.

slider_divider.label: Divider
slider_divider.description: Show a divider between grid columns.

slider_width_default.label: Phone Portrait
slider_width_default.description: Set the item width for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the item width of the next smaller screen size.

slider_width_small.label: Phone Landscape
slider_width_small.description: Set the item width for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the item width of the next smaller screen size.

slider_width_medium.label: Tablet Landscape
slider_width_medium.description: Set the item width for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the item width of the next smaller screen size.

slider_width_large.label: Desktop
slider_width_large.description: Set the item width for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the item width of the next smaller screen size.

slider_width_xlarge.label: Large Screens
slider_width_xlarge.description: Set the item width for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the item width of the next smaller screen size.

slider_sets.label: Sets
slider_sets.description: Group items into sets. The number of items within a set depends on the defined item width, e.g. 33% means that each set contains 3 items.
slider_sets.text: Slide all visible items at once

slider_velocity.label: Velocity
slider_velocity.description: Set the velocity in pixels per millisecond.

slider_autoplay_interval.label: Autoplay Interval
slider_autoplay_interval.description: Set the autoplay interval in seconds.

slider_parallax.label: Parallax
slider_parallax.description: Add a stepless parallax animation based on the scroll position.

slider_parallax_easing.label: Parallax Easing
slider_parallax_easing.description: Set the animation easing. Zero transitions at an even speed, a negative value starts off quickly while a positive value starts off slowly.

slider_parallax_target.label: Parallax Target
slider_parallax_target.description: The animation starts and stops depending on the element position in the viewport. Alternatively, use the position of a parent container.

nav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
nav_breakpoint.description: Display the navigation only on this device width and larger.

nav_color.label: Color
nav_color.description: Set light or dark color mode.

slidenav.label: Position
slidenav.description: Select the position of the slidenav.

slidenav_margin.label: Margin
slidenav_margin.description: Apply a margin between the slidenav and the slider container.

slidenav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
slidenav_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav only on this device width and larger.

slidenav_color.label: Color
slidenav_color.description: Set light or dark color mode.

slidenav_outside_breakpoint.label: Outside Breakpoint
slidenav_outside_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav outside only on this device width and larger. Otherwise, display it inside.

slidenav_outside_color.label: Outside Color
slidenav_outside_color.description: Set light or dark color if the slidenav is outside.

overlay_mode.label: Mode
overlay_mode.description: When using cover mode, you need to set the text color manually.

overlay_display.label: Display
overlay_display.description: Show the overlay only on hover or when the slide becomes active.

overlay_style.label: Style
overlay_style.description: Select the style for the overlay.

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls.

text_color_hover.text: Inverse text color on hover or when active

overlay_padding.label: Padding
overlay_padding.description: Set the padding between the overlay and its content.

overlay_position.label: Position
overlay_position.description: Select the overlay or content position.

overlay_margin.label: Margin
overlay_margin.description: Apply a margin between the overlay and the image container.

overlay_transition.label: Transition
overlay_transition.description: Select a transition for the overlay when it appears on hover or when active.

overlay_link.label: Link
overlay_link.description: Link the whole overlay if a link exists.

image_loading.label: Loading
image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

title_transition.label: Transition
title_transition.description: Select a transition for the title when the overlay appears on hover or when active.

title_style.label: Style
title_style.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

title_link.label: Link
title_link.description: Link the title if a link exists.

title_hover_style.label: Hover Style
title_hover_style.description: Set the hover style for a linked title.

title_decoration.label: Decoration
title_decoration.description: Decorate the title with a divider, bullet or a line that is vertically centered to the heading.

title_font_family.label: Font Family
title_font_family.description: Select an alternative font family. Mind that not all styles have different font families.

title_color.label: Color
title_color.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

title_element.label: HTML Element
title_element.description: Set the level for the section heading or give it no semantic meaning.

title_margin.label: Margin Top
title_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

meta_transition.label: Transition
meta_transition.description: Select a transition for the meta text when the overlay appears on hover or when active.

meta_style.label: Style
meta_style.description: Select a predefined meta text style, including color, size and font-family.

meta_element.label: HTML Element
meta_element.description: Set the level for the section heading or give it no semantic meaning.

meta_margin.label: Margin Top
meta_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

content_transition.label: Transition
content_transition.description: Select a transition for the content when the overlay appears on hover or when active.

content_style.label: Style
content_style.description: Select a predefined text style, including color, size and font-family.

content_margin.label: Margin Top
content_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

link_text.label: Text
link_text.description: Enter the text for the link.

link_aria_label.label: ARIA Label
link_aria_label.description: Enter a descriptive text label to make it accessible if the link has no visible text.

link_transition.label: Transition
link_transition.description: Select a transition for the link when the overlay appears on hover or when active.

link_margin.label: Margin Top
link_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-element, .el-nav, .el-item, .el-slidenav, .el-image, .el-title, .el-meta, .el-content, .el-link, .el-hover-image

fields.label: Height
fields.description:
The height will adapt automatically based on its content. Alternatively, the height can adapt to the height of the viewport.

Note: Make sure no height is set in the section settings when using one of the viewport options.
fields.name: _slider_height

fields.label: Parallax Start/End
fields.description: The animation starts when the element enters the viewport and ends when it leaves the viewport. Optionally, set a start and end offset, e.g. 100px, 50vh or 50vh + 50%. Percent relates to the target's height.

fields.label: Width/Height
fields.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.
